Hello and welcome! I'm all about making software that makes life easier, not harder. With a background in electrical and software engineering, I've spent some solid years diving into everything from cutting-edge vision applications at MABRI.VISION GmbH to payroll systems at PayFit in Berlin. Recently, I've been sharpening my skills in Fullstack Web Development at Le Wagon, where I've gotten my hands dirty building apps from the ground up with tools like Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

For me, it's all about creating straightforward, user-friendly tech. I'm here to solve real-world problems with code, and I love collaborating with others who share that vibe. If you're into making cool, practical software solutions then let's get in touch and make something awesome together. üöÄ

About me

I'm really into old-school cars, the ones from the '80s and '90s are my favorites.

When I'm not geeking out on tech, I love to hit the road in my motorhome, camera always at the ready.

I'm also a big fan of computers, whether it's gaming or just tinkering around with them.
